topic.title: <TextList>

ul.li:
Predefined Item Template:
SetView(Text) (default): list::DefaultTextListItemTemplate
SetView(Check): list::DefaultCheckTextListItemTemplate
SetView(Radio): list::DefaultRadioTextListItemTemplate

topic.p: <TextList/> stores a list of list::TextItem and display them.

You can add, remove or change items in the Items property to change content in the list control. In list::TextItem there is Text and Checked properties, changing to these properties also immediately causes changing in the list control.
The SelectedItem property returns the currently selected item in list::TextItem. The return value is always SelectedItemIndex == -1 ? nullptr : Items[SelectedItemIndex].
